TITLE.LOCALISED_TEXT: エルフのチャンピオン

FLAVOURTEXT.LOCALISED_TEXT: For what are leaves but countless blades To fight a countless foe on high. —Elvish hymn
“E cosa sono le foglie, se non lame innumerevoli Per combattere in cielo nemici innumerevoli.” —Inno elfico
„Denn was sind Blätter anderes als Klingen, Um einen zahllosen Feind zu bekämpfen?” —Wolkenwaldhymne
« Car les feuilles ne sont que lames innombrables pour combattre de haut un ennemi implacable. » —Hymne elfe
“Qué son las hojas sino incontables espadas para pelear contra enemigos incontables en las alturas.” —Himno élfico
葉こそ無数の刃なり。 無数の敵と戦うためのものなり。 ――エルフの賛歌
For what are leaves but countless blades To fight a countless foe on high. —Elvish hymn
“Да славятся клинки, что покорят Бесчисленное вражеское войско”. — Гимн эльфов
“O que são as folhas, senão incontáveis lâminas Para combater incontáveis inimigos no alto.” — Hino dos elfos

STATIC_ABILITY.LOCALISED_TEXT: Other Elf creatures get +1/+1 and have forestwalk.
Le altre creature Elfo prendono +1/+1 e hanno passa-Foreste.
Les autres créatures Elfe gagnent +1/+1 et ont la traversée des forêts.
Las otras criaturas Elfo obtienen +1/+1 y tienen la habilidad de cruzar bosques.
他のエルフ・クリーチャーは＋１/＋１の修整を受けるとともに森渡りを持つ。
Other Elf creatures get +1/+1 and have forestwalk.
Остальные существа Эльфы получают +1/+1 и имеют Знание Лесов.
As outras criaturas do tipo Elfo recebem +1/+1 e têm travessia de floresta.
STATIC_ABILITY.CONTINUOUS_ACTION: if FilteredCard() ~= nil then local characteristics = FilteredCard():GetCurrentCharacteristics() if characteristics ~= nil then characteristics:Power_Add( 1 ) characteristics:Toughness_Add( 1 ) end end

if FilteredCard() ~= nil then local characteristics = FilteredCard():GetCurrentCharacteristics() if characteristics ~= nil then characteristics:Characteristic_Set( CHARACTERISTIC_FORESTWALK, 1 ) end end
